recipes.title: Za'atar Chicken
recipes.description: Savory and spicy mediterranean inspired rice and chicken.
recipes.marination: 2 hours minimum - overnight needed for maximum flavor absorption.

recipes.title: Pollo a la brasa
recipes.description: Roasted and juicy chicken thighs paired with a spicy green salsa.
recipes.marination: 2 hours minimum - overnight needed for maximum flavor absorption.

recipes.title: Shrimp spring rolls
recipes.description: Light and flavorful spring rolls that combines spice with variation of veggies.
recipes.marination: None required - defrosting of shrimp needed if not fresh.
